00037     class Command 
00038     {
00039     public:
00042         Packet*       getPacket()              { return _packet; }
00043         const Packet* getPacket() const        { return _packet; }
00044 
00045         template< class P > P* getPacket()
00046             { EQASSERT( _packet ); return static_cast<P*>( _packet ); }
00047         template< class P > const P* getPacket() const
00048             { EQASSERT( _packet ); return static_cast<P*>( _packet ); }
00049 
00050         NodePtr getNode()      const { return _node; }
00051         LocalNodePtr getLocalNode() const { return _localNode; }
00052 
00053         bool     operator ! () const     { return ( _packet==0 ); }
00054 
00055         Packet*       operator->()       { EQASSERT(_packet); return _packet; }
00056         const Packet* operator->() const { EQASSERT(_packet); return _packet; }
00057 
00058         bool isValid() const { return ( _packet!=0 ); }
00059         uint64_t getAllocationSize() const { return _dataSize; }
00060 
00061         void setDispatchFunction( const Dispatcher::Func& func )
00062             { EQASSERT( !_func.isValid( )); _func = func; }
00064 
00067         bool isFree() const
00068             { EQ_TS_THREAD( _writeThread ); return ( _refCount==0 ); }
00069         CO_API void retain();
00070         CO_API void release();
00072 
00074         CO_API bool invoke();
00075

00077         Command();

00082                        const uint64_t size );
00083 
00092         void _clone( Command& from );

00095

00097         Command( const Command& from );       // disable copy
00098
